scripts.test:api:validate: cd tests/api && node -e "const TestRunner = require('./utils/test-runner'); const runner = new TestRunner(); runner.validateEnvironment().catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:api:report: cd tests/api && node -e "const TestRunner = require('./utils/test-runner'); const runner = new TestRunner(); runner.runAllTests().then(results => runner.generateReport(results)).catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:api:cleanup: cd tests/api && node -e "const TestRunner = require('./utils/test-runner'); const runner = new TestRunner(); runner.cleanup().catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:api
